document.full_text: a non-european head of the international monetary fund could mean a tougher, more realistic action plan for the euro zone debt crisis, mexican central bank chief agustin carstens said in newspaper interviews on tuesday.
document.title: imf candidate carstens urges tough euro zone plan
lines_and_colors: a non-european head of the international monetary fund could mean a tougher, more realistic action plan for the euro zone debt crisis, mexican central bank chief agustin carstens said in newspaper interviews on tuesday.
